00017 // EARS
00018 #include "DoubleDocUnigramCounter.hpp"
00019 
00020 
00022 ears::DoubleDocUnigramCounter::DoubleDocUnigramCounter(
00023           const lemur::utility::WeightedIDSet &docSet, 
00024           const lemur::api::Index &homeIndex )
00025         : ind(homeIndex), 
00026           lemur::utility::ArrayCounter<double>(homeIndex.termCountUnique()+1 )
00027 {
00028   docSet.startIteration();
00029   while ( docSet.hasMore() ) {
00030     int docID;
00031     double wt;
00032     docSet.nextIDInfo( docID, wt );
00033     countDocUnigram( docID, wt );
00034   }
00035 }
00036 
00037 
00038 
00040 void 
00041 ears::DoubleDocUnigramCounter::countDocUnigram( lemur::api::DOCID_T docID, 
00042                                                 double weight )
00043 {
00044   lemur::api::TermInfoList *tList = ind.termInfoList( docID );
00045   const lemur::api::TermInfo *info;
00046   tList->startIteration();
00047   while ( tList->hasMore() ) {
00048     info = tList->nextEntry();
00049     incCount( info->termID(), weight*info->count() );
00050   }
00051   delete tList;
00052 }
